DOC.brief_summary: This study was designed to evaluate consistency in the antibody response to three manufactured lots of an investigational Rotavirus Vaccine.
DOC.criteria: Healthy infants History of abdominal disorders from a birth defect, intussusception, or abdominal surgery Known or suspected problems with the immune system Fever at time of immunization Prior administration of a rotavirus vaccine History of known prior rotavirus disease, chronic diarrhea, or failure to thrive.
